description: Bid solicitation for repair and replacement of floor finishes.
full_summary:
# Tender Announcement: Repair and Replacement of Floor Finishes

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is issuing a Request for Standing Offer (RFSA) for the Repair and Replacement of Floor Finishes at 17 Wing, Winnipeg, Manitoba.

## Contract Details

* **Reference Number:** WS3821145023
* **Publication Date:** 2023-02-13
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-03-01T14:00:00 EST
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** None
* **Expected Contract End Date:** 2025-03-31
* **Contract Category:** CNST (Construction Services)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

## Contract Description

The work under this Standing Offer involves the furnishing of all labour, materials, tools, equipment, transportation, and supervision necessary to complete all flooring work on an as-and-when-requested basis, by the Department of National Defence at 17 Wing, Winnipeg, Manitoba, St. Charles Range, 4044 Saskatchewan Ave, Winnipeg, Manitoba, and Springer Lake, Training Area Nopiming Provincial Park.

## Tender Procedure

*   This bid solicitation cancels and supersedes previous bid solicitation number WS3821145023 (Doc3821213598) dated 2023-01-19 with a closing of 2023-02-03 at 02:00 PM EST.
*   A debriefing or feedback session will be provided upon request to bidders/offerors/suppliers who bid on the previous solicitation.
*   All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 2023-03-01 at 02:00 EST.
*   All bids submitted after 02:00 EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.

## Contracting Entity

*   Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5
*   Contact Information: Christopher Lau (SPAC/PSPC), christopher.lau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

## Notice and Attachments

*   The full notice and attachments can be viewed at: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15403987?extsite=MTU0MDM5ODdf
